languageKey.label: If you don't want to use the default template, you can simply add the path to your own template here. e.g. fileadmin/templates/mx_template.html
Select the format in which you want the output to be rendered. Please note that for RSS and ATOM this will be the only content that is put out. HTTP headers will be modified as well.
The pages will be sorted by this column/direction. Only change this value if you want to change the default order in which the pages are sorted (tree-form).
The maximum number of pages that should be displayed (counts for the combination of pages/records).
The maximum number of records/pages that will be outputted (e.g. to generate an RSS feed with updated pages)
Select the record configurations you would like to use for the sitemap here.
Google Sitemap
This is the rate at which the content is updated. Possibilities: daily, weekly and montly.
Google Sitemap
The default priority for your pages and records, this is a value between 0 and 1. Where 0.1 equals the lowest priority and 1.0 equals the highest. Default is 0.5 (normal priority).
